summary: This is an internal FBI email chain discussing a surprise press conference held at Jeffrey Epstein's mansion on January 27, 2020. The email reveals confusion within the FBI about the event, its connection to victim services organization Safe Horizon, and that comments were made about the active investigation, specifically regarding Prince Andrew. It also notes that victims were upset they were not notified.

persons.name: Geoff
persons.role: Person who answered questions at press conference
persons.context: Mentioned as having answered at least one specific question about the investigation relating to Prince Andrew during the press conference at Epstein's mansion.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Referenced in relation to a question answered about the active investigation during the press conference at Epstein's mansion.

events.title: Press Conference at Epstein's Mansion
events.description: A press conference was held at Jeffrey Epstein's mansion. It was connected to Safe Horizon, a victim services organization. Comments were made about the active investigation, including a question answered about Prince Andrew.

keyFacts: A press conference was held at Jeffrey Epstein's mansion on January 27, 2020, which took FBI personnel by surprise.
The press conference was connected to the victim services organization Safe Horizon.
During the conference, a person named Geoff answered at least one specific question about the active investigation relating to Prince Andrew.
FBI Victim Specialists were fielding calls from irate victims who were not notified about the press conference.
The email indicates internal FBI confusion and a lack of prior communication about the event from supervisors.
